attributes.title: READ UNTIL THE END
attributes.review: alright where do i even start. lemme just start off but saying this is the worst, most horrible, diabolical, disgusting, horrendous, revolting, sickening, repulsive app i have ever had the unfortunate chance of downloading. please i beg of you do not EVER GET THIS APP. it took 3 years to download and it took up ALL OF MY STORAGE. along with deleting all of my photos and deleting almost every single app that i have downloaded in my phone. EVEN MY PHOTOS APP WHICH I DIDN'T KNOW WAS POSSIBLE. i am deeply disappointed in this app and i am warning everyone who stumbles upon this to NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP. all of my pictures are gone.  my album of 800 harry styles photos? gone. my christmas countdown app? gone. my music app, my only form of happiness? gone. my jetpack joy ride app? gone. my minecraft app? GONE. the only thing that was left was this app store which and i am very grateful for so that  i could rate this terrible, horrible, no good, very bad app. so please, i beg of you, do not download this app. instead of wasting your time doing so, PLEASE GO SIGN PETITONS AND DONATE TO THOSE IN NEED. thank you.
